title: Frieze New York Package
seo_title: Frieze Art Fair New York Package
seo_description: Enjoy one of two packages below and receive 15% savings off Best Available Rates with a complimentary 2PM late check-out.
contents:
Enjoy one of two packages below and receive 15% savings off Best Available Rates with a complimentary 2PM late check-out.


  • A day at the Fair package provides two nights minimum stay in any room type except suites, 2- one day Frieze fair tickets that will allow all day unlimited entry to the fair.
  • Experience Frieze like VIP package includes two nights minimum stay in suite, 1 double VIP invitation, Transportation and Truffles at turndown service. The VIP card gives unlimited access to the fair for two people, access to the VIP lounge and full diary of VIP events taking place during the fair.

Offers valid for travel by May 4 to May 10, 2016 and ticket is valid from May 5 to May 8, 2016. Any additional information about Frieze New York Fair, please check www. frieze.com/fairs/frieze-new-york.

This offer includes

  • A day at the Fair
  • Minimum Lead Time: 7 days
